root.Summary: 1: Bevilacqua V, Gioia U, Di Carlo V, Tortorelli AF, Colombo T, Bozzoni I, LaneveP, Caffarelli E. Identification of linc-NeD125, a novel long non coding RNA that hosts miR-125b-1 and negatively controls proliferation of human neuroblastomacells. RNA Biol. 2015 Oct 19:0.
